full_summary:
### Solicitation Title: #5000071288
#### Summary

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) has a requirement for Aerological Observations and Related Services at the Goose Bay Upper Air Station. 

### Contract ID: PW-23-01030951
#### Amendment: #1

**Published Date**: 2023-03-28  
**Closing Date**: 2023-05-09 14:00:00  
**Status**: Expired  
This solicitation has been closed.  
 
#### Contract Details
 - **GSIN (Government Services Integrator Network)**: 
   * E101A: Air Quality Support Services
   * E199D: Environmental Services
   * R102A: Weather Reporting/Observation Services
- **Soliciation Type**: Request for Proposal  
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding  
- **Trade Agreements**: 
   *Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement  
   *Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)  
   *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)  
   *Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)  
   *Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement  
   *Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement  
   *Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)  
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada  
- **Regions of Delivery**: Newfoundland and Labrador  
- **Contracting Entity**: Environment Canada  
- **Contact Information**: Timothy Pelletier  
  Contact Email: [mailto:timothy.pelletier@canada.ca](mailto:timothy.pelletier@canada.ca)  
  Contact Phone: 902-920-4479  
  Contact Address: 45 Alderney Dr., Dartmouth, NS B2Y 2N6, CA

#### Associated Documents
Documents associated with this solicitation are available on [Canada Buys portal](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/).

- [Rev.1 to Solicitation Final en-fr v1](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/18/9f0056effc2cf703d61160fdb829c4ce/5000071288_-_amendment_001_to_solicitation_final_en-fr_v1.pdf)
- [Rev.1 to Solicitation Final fr](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/18/90
